# tf.contrib.layers.summarize_collection

``` python
tf.contrib.layers.summarize_collection(
    collection,
    name_filter=None,
    summarizer=tf.contrib.layers.summarize_tensor
)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/layers/python/layers/summaries.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.10/tensorflow/contrib/layers/python/layers/summaries.py).

See the guide: [Layers (contrib) > Summaries](../../../../../api_guides/python/contrib.layers#Summaries)

Summarize a graph collection of tensors, possibly filtered by name.
